title: Cant access my account even after changing password several times.
body: i have changed my password several times but still can not log into my account i know my user name and even tried making 2 new accounts with my other emails and changed the passwords on them a few times but still will not let me log on to play. it let me log into the website but not the actual game. anyone have any ideas on why this is?

replies.body: What error are you getting when trying to log in? If it's not the "incorrect username or password" message it could be a connection or routing related issue. Let me know what the error itself says so I guide you in the right direction!
